conversations.body_text: 你好，Lorenzo Franceschini，  您好，请放心，我们会按照您订单中提供的地址发货。货物将在本周陆续发出，请您耐心等待。由此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。
ID 为 8792 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8792  
      主题: Re: Link to order #SSN4006  
      描述:  I just saw that the billing address is not correct. The shipping address is correct: 
 
 
 Via Antonio Rosmini, 72 
 38122 Trento Trentino 
 Italy 
 3881229021 
 But the billing address show a “Via Antonio Rosmini, 73” 
   
 Can I ask when will the order arrive? 
 
  
 Il giorno dom 21 dic 2025 alle 08:58 SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

Hi Lorenzo Franceschini,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.
